      • isReserved

        public static boolean isReserved(java.lang.String token)
        Checks if the token is a reserved keyword or not
        Parameters:
        token - the String that caused the parsing error
        Returns:
        true if the token is a reserved keyword according to SqlBase.g4 false otherwise
